column4: I have installed spyder on my Ubuntu 11.10 and can run it by typing "spyder" in terminal.  I would like to have it as an icon in my launcher instead.  How do I do that?
Vibhav, supplementary question: Can I edit the icon that was generated?
Is there a way of editing/replacing icons in launcher?
I can find system settings but neither preferences nor main menu ... eek!
To be honest, I preferred the classic ubuntu to this dash stuff.
I was scared to say in case I offended someone.
However, I am eager to move to something more intuitive for me.
i didnt like it so stayed at 10...let me look
